welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ottobrunn, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by our quaint Bavarian town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Ottobrunn has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oberpfaffenhofen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Franz Josef Strauss Airport, primarily serving Lufthansa and Star Alliance flights.

wifi.note: Unlimited free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fuerstenfeldbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
